title: Bella Hadid shares 'bittersweet' Vogue Netherlands cover ...shot on day Dutch grandma Ans died
text:
Bella Hadid shared her 'bitter sweet' new cover of Vogue Netherlands.

The 23-year-old supermodel, whose mother Yolanda Hadid is from Holland, flashed her legs in a cleavage-baring red and pink ensemble.

She shared in her caption that she completed the cover shoot on the day that her maternal grandmother Ans Van Den Herik died at 78 after a cancer battle.

'I hope she is proud of me': Bella Hadid shared her 'bitter sweet' new cover of Vogue Netherlands, sharing it was shot the day her Dutch grandmother Ans Van Den Herik died

'This cover is very bitter sweet. I’ve always wanted to do my Dutch vogue cover in Holland to represent my family ,my mother, my cousins, my aunt, uncle and especially my Oma,' Bella wrote, using the Dutch word for 'grandma.'

'Finally I was able to have the opportunity, but on this day , I got a phone call from my mom right when we finished our last shot,' Bella shared.

'She said Oma passed that afternoon. This was one of the worst phone calls and all I wished, had I done it sooner, she would have been able to see it to tell me what she thought,' she continued.

Dearly departed: Bella shared that when Ans died the day of the Vogue cover shoot 'I wished, had I done it sooner, she would have been able to see it to tell me what she thought'

The sister of Gigi Hadid wrote: 'I hope she is proud of me. I love you Oma and Mama. This was such a memorable day in so many ways.'

Bella expressed gratitude for photographer Sean Thomas, Vogue Netherlands editor-in-chief Rinke Tjepkema 'and the team for being so great'.

Ans died at the end of August and her family traveled to Rotterdam for the funeral, where Gigi was accompanied with her then-rumored beau Tyler Cameron of The Bachelorette fame, People magazine reported.

Throwback: Ans died at the end of August and her family traveled to Rotterdam for the funeral; Bella is pictured as a child with her beloved grandmother

Bella's Vogue Netherlands shoot took place in and around Amsterdam's Rijksmuseum, and the cover saw her lounging across the floor inside the building.

She was positioned beneath the iconic Dutch painter Rembrandt's 1633 portrait of Remonstrant preacher Johannes Wtenbogaert.

Bella is covering the magazine's Dutch Design Issue, which is a tribute to the 350th anniversary of Rembrandt's death on October 4, 1669.
description: Bella Hadid shared her 'bitter sweet' new cover of Vogue Netherlands. The 23-year-old supermodel, whose mother Yolanda Hadid is from Holland, flashed her legs in a busty ensemble.
